name: Client Onboarding Workflow
description: Complete client onboarding flow: form capture, CRM entry, info request, contract via DocuSign, welcome email, and team notification. Uses Notion as placeholder for ClickUp/CRM.

messages.info_request_en:
Hi {{client_name}},

Thank you for signing up with {{company_name}}! We're excited to have you on board.

To complete your onboarding, please provide the following:
- Company logo (high resolution)
- Billing address
- Primary contact person and phone number
- Preferred communication method

Reply to this email with the details, or send them via WhatsApp to {{company_whatsapp}}.

Best regards,
{{company_name}} Team

messages.contract_email_en:
Hi {{client_name}},

Please review and sign your service agreement using the secure DocuSign link below:

ğŸ“ [Sign Contract]({{docusign_link}})

The contract includes:
- Service terms and conditions
- Payment schedule
- Confidentiality agreement

Once signed, we'll activate your account immediately.

Questions? Reply to this email or call {{company_phone}}.

Best regards,
{{company_name}}
